keyMoments.title: Robin Thanks the Crew
keyMoments.description: Robin stands up and thanks everyone for saving her, even when she felt she wasn't worth saving. She covers Luffy's mouth with a sprouted hand and smiles warmly.
keyMoments.significance: This is Robin's emotional acknowledgment of the crew's sacrifice and love for her. It marks her full acceptance of being saved and her commitment to the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Robin Breaks Spandam's Spine
keyMoments.description: Nico Robin spots Spandam and uses her Clutch technique to break his spine, getting revenge for all the physical and mental abuse he inflicted upon her.
keyMoments.significance: A cathartic moment for Robin, allowing her to literally break free from her tormentor. It marks her complete liberation from CP9.

keyMoments.title: Cien Fleur: Defense
keyMoments.description: Robin demonstrates a new application of her Devil Fruit powers using Cien Fleur: Defense to protect the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's growing mastery of her Hana Hana no Mi abilities and commitment to protecting her crew.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms to create a defensive formation protecting allies from attacks.

reveals.information: Robin fully accepts being saved and embraces her place with the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Sanji Closes the Gates of Justice
keyMoments.description: Sanji successfully pulls the lever to close the Gates of Justice, causing massive whirlpools that disrupt the Marines' aim and enable the crew's escape.
keyMoments.significance: This critical tactical decision is essential to the crew's successful escape. It demonstrates Sanji's quick thinking and decisive action.

keyMoments.title: Cannonball Defense with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Sanji and Zoro work together to catch incoming cannonballs in Luffy's stretched rubber body and launch them back at Marine vessels.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's combat synergy and ability to improvise under pressure.

keyMoments.title: Franky's Coup de Vent Launch
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Coup de Vent technique to fire a massive blast of compressed air, launching the Going Merry clear of danger and to safety.
keyMoments.significance: This technique proves essential to the crew's escape and showcases Franky's incredible cyborg abilities, foreshadowing his value to the crew.

reveals.information: Demonstrates the full power of Coup de Vent in a critical rescue situation

keyMoments.title: Cho Kemuri Boshi Smokescreen
keyMoments.description: Usopp deploys his Cho Kemuri Boshi (Super Smoke Star) to create a massive smokescreen for the Going Merry's escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's tactical value to the crew and his evolution as a sniper/support specialist.

abilities.description: A super smoke star that creates a massive smokescreen to provide cover.

keyMoments.title: Aokiji Arrives at Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: Admiral Aokiji arrives at the ruins of Enies Lobby and observes the destruction with his typical lazy demeanor.
keyMoments.significance: Aokiji's presence adds tension and represents the World Government's acknowledgment of this massive defeat.

keyMoments.title: Declares Complete Defeat
keyMoments.description: Aokiji orders the Marines to stand down, acknowledging that Enies Lobby's destruction represents a complete defeat for the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: First time the World Government has suffered such a humiliating and total defeat, establishing the Straw Hats as a serious threat.
keyMoments.quote: There's no way we can depict this as anything but a complete defeat.

reveals.information: Shows Aokiji's pragmatic and somewhat rebellious nature in acknowledging the government's defeat

keyMoments.title: Spine Broken by Robin
keyMoments.description: Spandam's spine is broken by Robin's Clutch attack, completely incapacitating him as revenge for his abuse.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Spandam's complete defeat and Robin's liberation from her tormentor.

statusHistory.reason: Spine broken by Nico Robin's Clutch attack

keyMoments.title: Reunited with Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Luffy joyfully reacts to the Going Merry's miraculous arrival to rescue the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's emotional connection to the ship and sets up the bittersweet farewell to come.
keyMoments.quote: Merry! You came to save us!

keyMoments.title: Rubber Body Cannonball Defense
keyMoments.description: Luffy's rubber body is used by Zoro and Sanji to catch and return cannonballs at the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Creative use of Luffy's Devil Fruit powers in a defensive/counter-attack capacity.

keyMoments.title: Cannonball Defense with Sanji
keyMoments.description: Zoro and Sanji work together to catch incoming cannonballs in Luffy's stretched rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates combat synergy despite their rivalry.

keyMoments.title: Navigating the Escape
keyMoments.description: Nami expertly navigates the Going Merry through the whirlpools and away from the Buster Call.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's exceptional navigation skills in crisis situations.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー
